body_html:
Didn't ExternalProject_Add work? What error did it generate? I believe that's a better way to import an external project.

You see that the include directory is specified relative to the current working directory. It should be easy to fix this.

-isystem src/ATen/contrib/sleef/include
body_text:
Didn't ExternalProject_Add work? What error did it generate? I believe that's a better way to import an external project.
You see that the include directory is specified relative to the current working directory. It should be easy to fix this.
-isystem src/ATen/contrib/sleef/include
body:
Didn't ExternalProject_Add work? What error did it generate? I believe that's a better way to import an external project.

You see that the include directory is specified relative to the current working directory. It should be easy to fix this.
```
-isystem src/ATen/contrib/sleef/include
```
